summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of North 42nd Street, from Fremont Avenue to Greenwood Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7583 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
